snippet: Manchester United sustained a third consecutive defeat at the start of 2014 as Sunderland won the first leg of the League Cup semifinal, 2-1, on Tuesday.
abstract: Sunderland defeats Manchester United, 2-1, handing team its third consecutive defeat; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Manchester United sustained a third consecutive defeat at the start of 2014 as Sunderland won the first leg of the League Cup semifinal, 2-1, on Tuesday.
